head.supplied: South Australia. ¶ MEMORANDUM OF TRANSFER ¶ . ¶ I, ¶ ¶ Ferdinand Jacob Heinrich Müller ¶ of Melbourne in the Province of Victoria ¶ being registered as the proprietor of an estate ¶ in fee simple...

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end; background-color: #ffff00;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p:
I,
Ferdinand Jacob Heinrich Müller of Melbourne in the Province of Victoria being registered as the proprietor of an estate in fee simple subject, however, to such encumbrances, liens, and interests, as are notified by memoranda underwritten or endorsed hereon, in all those two allotments of land situated in the Hundred of Bremer, County of Hindmarsh, numbered " 23 " and " 24 " of Section 2607 laid out as the Township of New Hamburg containing two acres and seven perches or thereabouts bounded as the same are delineated in the plan in the margin of Certificate of Title Vol XLV Folio 207

In consideration of the sum of Twenty five Pounds Sterling paid to me by Charles Crouch of New Hamburg labourer the receipt of which sum I hereby acknowledge, do hereby transfer to the said Charles Crouch all my estate and interest in the said two allotments of land above described.
In witness whereof I have hereunto subscribed my name this twelveth day of July 1865
Signed on the day above-named by the said Ferdinand Jacob Heinrrich Müller

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
one of the judges of the Supreme Court of Victoria
A cover sheet identifies 'No. 11035 Transfer of lots 23, 24 situated in New Hamburgh' from M as Vendor to Crouch as Purchaser; 'Particulars entered in the Register Book, Vol. XLV Folio 207, the 22 day of July 1865 at Noon, having been certified as 'Correct for purposes of Registration' by F. E. Krichauff, Licensed Broker. MS is accompanied by a sheet headed 'Pursuant to Memorandum of Transfer No. 11035', with a more detailed specification of the parcel of land and its boundaries including, on the west side, the River Angas.
